entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.3Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:35 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:35 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:35 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
